quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock. – Thomas Jefferson
fact: Odds of being killed by lightening? 1 in 2million/killed in a car crash? 1 in 5,000/killed by falling out of bed? 1 in 2million/killed in a plane crash? 1 in 25 million.
joke: A man walked in to a bar with some asphalt on his arm. He said “Two beers please, one for me and one for the road.”
